actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend section 133 (e) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 in order to provide for individual views in the Senate committee reports in lieu of supplemental views.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to entitle members of Senate standing committees to express individual views in committee reports.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 133 (e) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 in order to provide for individual views in the Senate committee reports in lieu of supplemental views.
